message.content:
Consomme is a clear soup that is made by clarifying stock. It is typically served as a starter or as an accompaniment to a main course. 
Consomme has a light golden or amber color and a very clear and transparent appearance. 
It has a smooth and silky texture without any visible chunks or solids. 
Consomme is often garnished with finely chopped vegetables, herbs, or cooked meat. 
It is typically served hot and is traditionally consumed during formal or elegant dinners. 
Consomme can be found in fine dining restaurants, hotels, and banquet halls. 
Its visual characteristics showcase its elegance, delicate flavor, and refined presentation.
